category.description: This gives details of individuals, companies and vessels with whom national or supranational bodies have decreed firms should not have financial dealings. Dealings with these designated persons or entities can lead to large fines, jail sentences and increased regulatory oversight owing to perceived failures in systems of internal control.

actions.text: No 2693 (Jun 2014 - addition. Jun 2017 amended). PRIMARY NAME: Sergei Borisovich IVANOV. Date of Birth: 1953-01-31. Formerly Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office. As such, responsible for setting Russia's policy on Ukraine. Currently, Russian President's special envoy on environment and transport issues (since 12 August 2016).

details.text: No 2693 (Jun 2014 - addition. Jun 2017 amended). PRIMARY NAME: Sergei Borisovich IVANOV. Date of Birth: 1953-01-31. Formerly Chief of Staff of the Presidential Executive Office. As such, responsible for setting Russia's policy on Ukraine. Currently, Russian President's special envoy on environment and transport issues (since 12 August 2016).
details.title: AUSTRALIA SANCTIONS - DFAT-AS

details.text: Chairman of the Board of Directors of Rostelecom (SOE) (Jun 2015 - ). Member of the Supervisory Board of Rostec (SOE) (sanctioned entity) (Apr 2017 - ). Chief of Staff of the Presidential Administration (Dec 2011 - Aug 2016). Special Presidential Representative for Environmental Protection, Ecology and Transport (Aug 2016 - ). Member of the Supervisory Board of Russian Direct Investment Fund Management Company (sanctioned entity) (SOE) (reported 2012 - Apr 2016). Chairman of the Supervisory Board of Russian Highways (SOE) (2011). Member of the Supervisory Board of Vnesheconombank (SOE) (2007 - Jan 2012). Chairman of the Board of Directors of United Aircraft Corporation (SOE) (2006 - 2011). Deputy Prime Minister (Nov 2005 - Feb 2007) (May 2008 - Dec 2011). First Deputy Prime Minister (Feb 2007 - May 2008). Head of the Military-Industrial Commission (Mar 2006). Minister of Defence (Mar 2001 - Feb 2007). Member of the Security Council (Nov 1999 - May 2008). Deputy Director of the Federal Security Service (FSB) (1998 - 1999).
details.title: BIOGRAPHY

category.description: This gives details of high-ranking government officials in over 200 countries. Although there may be no reason why you should not do business with these individuals, the Basle Committee on Banking supervision has stated that one should check these customers because without this due diligence, banks can become subject to reputational, operational, legal and concentration risks, which can result in significant financial cost.
